title: Hotelrezeption (DE-DE) (Enhanced)
lines: Ich habe eine Reservierung auf den Namen...
grammarBrief:
The phrases demonstrate various sentence structures and verb tenses: 
1. 'Ich habe eine Reservierung auf den Namen...' uses the present perfect tense with 'haben' as the auxiliary verb, showing a completed action relevant to the present.
2. 'Ist das Frühstück inbegriffen?' uses a present tense verb 'ist' (is) and a past participle 'inbegriffen' (included) to ask about a current state or condition.
3. Questions like 'Wann ist Check-out?' and 'Haben Sie Zimmerservice?' illustrate the use of inversion to form questions, placing the verb before the subject.
